blacklisted.title: The estuary address is blacklisted
blacklisted.explanation: Please remove the following address from the "Blacklist" menu, before continuing :

generic.title: Failed to check Estuary connection requirements, please try later or contact the CIDgravity team.

prerequisite.label: 1. Estuary implements basic tests before accepting a new miner:
prerequisite.reachability: Miner reachability is public: <1>lotus-miner net reachability</1>
prerequisite.minerPrice: Miner price is set to 0 for verified deals: <1>lotus-miner storage-deals get-ask</1>
prerequisite.onChain: Miner public address is published on chain: <1>lotus-miner actor set-addrs /ip4/_PUBLIC_IP_/tcp/_PORT_</1>

doSign.label: 2. Run this command to sign the Estuary connection message:

choose.label: Choose the pricing model to apply to all Estuary deals

subtitle.existingPricingModel: An '{{clientName}}' client has been created with the '{{pricingModelName}}' pricing model.
